titleStmt.title: An introduction to the history of England comprising the principal affairs of this land, from its first planting, to the coming of the English Saxons : together with a catalogue of the British and Pictish kings / by Daniel Langhorne.
titleStmt.author: Langhorne, Daniel, d. 1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Charles Harper, and John Amery ...,
